tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Hi,I  have been traveling with them for last one year.Dr.Divya Sivaraman is so friendly and approachable. She thoroughly studied our past history  and past treatment. I have done 7 IVF in the past. She found our root cause and now I  have a precious little boy. I have gone through all the treatment but nothing worked for me.I  work in overseas.Generally IVF treatment are not  personalised but here in srushti it is more personalised than a general protocol for all patients. I  stayed here for one year under close observation with Dr.Divya. She is very approachable, ready to answer all your doubts and phone call at anytime to clear any doubts.No much waiting time during consultation or regular visits during pregnancy. I have attended both porur and Ramapuram branch. All staffs are very friendly and knowledgeable. I highly recommend this hospital to couples who wish to have a little ðŸ˜‡ ðŸ‘¼ angel.

Good. Doctor is very courteous and reassuring in her approach. Gives honest guidance while also ensuring patient does not panic. One item i request the hospital consider is that the doctors are really busy. It would be nice if doctors spend more time per patient or increase the number of doctors available for out patient services.

For in-patients, I could not see duty doctors in attendance. They require duty doctors to support admitted patients. This reduces anxiety of inpatients and their attenders if the require pre/post operative care and consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr Divya on video consultation. Highly professional and recommended! Dr was on time and patiently listened to our concerns. provided proper feedback and helped us come out of our mental trauma.

Very well friendly behaviour. Divya mam talks are very positive which talks for future as well. Staffs are very supportive.  Medical is working  hard to stick to the timings which i believe not an issue... Thank you.

Treatment is costly and hospitalisation is not good. The exact doctor was not  available and other one did the treatment,which is worst. In first visit they charged 2100. I do not recommend this doctor and hospital.

Dr.Divya is excellent in explaining what's happening in my body.Knowledable.one small request for ur hospital.pls stick on to appointment timings.my appointment to meet Dr was around 1.I could meet Dr only by 3.I am a working women and its difficult to skip from my duty too.being without kid is unbearable pain; with this convincing my immediate boss for taking leave and permissions adds much more pain.pls make necessary actions for the same.I can understand that Dr is busy in surgery etc.pls give appointments acc to Dr availability timings.this is my only concern. Hope u took this in right aspect.consider this as my humble request. I am happy with Dr.divya as well as Dr.samundi.

Doctor is very kind.treatment also best in another hospital.I tried to conceive past 2 year in another hospital,but I am not conceive.Here I came April 2015,just to month treatment taken , now I am 6 month pregnant. Me and my husband very happy.Thanks for shruti hospital.
Good consultation,  however not getting consulated with on time. Consultation done very fastly less than  5 mins.
very empathetic doctor. She explains both pros and cons for any decision to be taken. Very soft spoken and spends time to hear our concerns and queries.
In the begining iwas scared with the hospital and new doctors but after consulting divya mam and samundi mam i got hope of fighting back .......
